entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
